description:
More than just another button-up, the Campshire shirt takes the shirtjac to the next level. With a hard-wearing cotton outer layer and a soft, warm Sherpa fleece lining, this shirt is excellent for bridging seasons and extending your comfort range.

  • Lined with soft, high-pile Sherpa fleece to hold in warmth
  • Heatseeker® Eco synthetic insulation
  • Outer layer is light, efficient and composed of 70% post-consumer recycled material
  • Dual chest pockets and side seam pockets keep necessities close and hands warm
  • Snap-down front placket
  • Adjustable snaps at the cuffs
  • Standard fit
name: The North Face Campshire Shirt - Women's
